description: This file is the entry point for a React application. It imports React, ReactDOM, styling, and the main App component. It initializes the React root and renders the App component within StrictMode.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root for rendering React components into the DOM.

methods.name: react-dom.client.createRoot
methods.description: Method used to initialize React rendering in the specified DOM element.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders the React component tree into the root.
